title: Roasted vegetables with horseradish sauce
ingredients: ['250 g (9 oz) raw beetroot', '250 g (9 oz) carrots', '250 g (9 oz) parsnips', '400 g (14 oz) potatoes', '1 whole head garlic', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '25 g (1 oz) day-old bread, crusts removed', '100 ml (3Â½ fl oz) skimmed milk', '2 tablespoons creamed horseradish', 'Salt and black pepper', 'To garnish: a few sprigs of fresh thyme']
